pr_title: Add copy on long press to device details in Form Metdata

timeline.bodyText: I think that this is good but I'm concerned that it will get lost and forgotten. How about marking KEYS_WE_SHOULD_NOT_RESET as deprecated and describing this strategy? Maybe meta should be a constant somewhere?
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Yeah I was in two minds about this as I'm not a fan of the existing shared prefs abstractions and the keys classes. I do agree that it would be nice to have something that makes the meta prefs more discoverable though so they get used for other things. I'll have a think.
replies.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText: As a note I'd like to keep the test with a hardcoded/inline as this prevents someone changing the constant (in the code) and the test still passing. It's checking configuration as well as behaviour.
replies.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText: I'm going to go with a provider for the meta prefs for now. I didn't want to start building a whole MetaSharedPrefences to mimic the other ones. I like that we have abstraction for prefs storage though so I might follow up with a refactor that pulls out the shared logic around shared prefs and maybe improves the interfaces a little.
replies.author: seadowg
